info.title: MotoMedic IMS API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the MotoMedic Inventory Management System, generated with a modular structure.

post.description: Logs in a user and returns an access token and refresh token.
Refreshes an expired access token using a refresh token.
Logs out the currently authenticated user by invalidating the token.

get.description: Returns the data of the currently authenticated user.

post.description: Assigns one or more permissions to a specific role.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of users.

post.description: Resets the password for a user.

expires_in.description: The token expiration time in seconds.

refresh_token.description: The refresh token to get a new access token.

new_access_token.description: The new access token for authentication.

expires_in.description: The token expiration time in seconds.

permissions.description: An array of permission IDs to assign to the role.

new_password.description: New password (required if is_default_password is false)

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized. The token is invalid or expired.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden. The user does not have permission to access this resource.

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found.

bearerAuth.description: Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your ACCESS TOKEN.

refreshToken.description: Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your REFRESH TOKEN.
